column5: booked a trip to horwood lake in july some thing to look forward too also i met solo paddler great person to talk fishing with and hopefully to go fishing with
Was great meeting you as well Doug!  As I said at the show I'm sure you'll enjoy Horwood.  Next year it'll be a trip to the Attawapiskat though.

This is the second time in less than a week that I have heard about Horwood Lake. The fellow i spoke with last Friday was saying how great te fishing was there and he was booked for a few weeks around the same time.  Enjoy!
Doug , you are going to be a busy man this summer. Lakair g2g in june then horwood in july.
thanks dan i hope i can do both

I have posted another thread on a family fishing resort referral.  I have a family of 5 and 2 grandparents that want to go for a week on a family fishing trip.  I was looking for an all inclusive resort, with boat, guides, beach and activities for the kids. Would you recommend Horwood Lake? Thanks.

Will be at Horwood in July this year as well.  Staying at Horwood Lake Lodge, but I think only Horwoood Outpost was at the last show??  Anyway, can't wait to do some slalom through the flotilla of logs!!
